unnormalised: Chalo, let's talk shopping, bhai! You won't believe the craze this Diwali. Flipkart and Amazon are going crazy with the discounts, right? It's a proper jingle-bell sale from Oct 20th to Nov 5th.
normalised: Chalo, let's talk shopping, bhai! You won't believe the craze this Diwali. F-L-I-P-K-A-R-T and A-M-A-Z-O-N are going crazy with the discounts, right? It's a proper jingle-bell sale from October twentieth to November fifth.

unnormalised: First up, smartphones. That Oppo Reno is selling for only Rs. 25000, down from Rs. 30000. Can you imagine? My neighbour, Sharmaji's beta, already booked one.
normalised: First up, smartphones. That Oppo Reno is selling for only rupee twenty five thousand, down from rupee thirty thousand. Can you imagine? My neighbour, Sharmaji's beta, already booked one.

unnormalised: Then, there's the clothes section. Sarees from Mysore silk are 40% off. My wife's been eyeing one for ages. Guess I'll be making someone happy this Diwali.
normalised: Then, there's the clothes section. Sarees from Mysore silk are forty percent off. My wife's been eyeing one for ages. Guess I'll be making someone happy this Diwali.

unnormalised: And haan, electronics! That Sony Bravia 55-inch TV is going for Rs. 55000. I mean, last year it was like Rs. 70000! I'm seriously considering upgrading.
normalised: And haan, electronics! That Sony Bravia fifty five inch T-V is going for rupee fifty five thousand. I mean, last year it was like rupee seventy thousand! I'm seriously considering upgrading.

unnormalised: Groceries are on sale too. 5 kg of basmati rice for just Rs. 350? Normally it's like Rs. 500! Stock up, people, stock up!
normalised: Groceries are on sale too. five kilogram of basmati rice for just rupee three hundred and fifty? Normally it's like rupee five hundred! Stock up, people, stock up!

unnormalised: But the real kicker? They're offering a flat 20% cashback if you pay with an HDFC credit card. That's like free money! I tell you, this Diwali shopping is going to be epic.
normalised: But the real kicker? They're offering a flat twenty percent cashback if you pay with an H-D-F-C credit card. That's like free money! I tell you, this Diwali shopping is going to be epic.

unnormalised: Don't forget to check out the small businesses too! Local artisans are selling handmade diyas for like Rs. 20 each. Support local, yaar! It's good karma.
normalised: Don't forget to check out the small businesses too! Local artisans are selling handmade diyas for like rupee twenty each. Support local, yaar! It's good karma.

unnormalised: Remember to compare prices and read the fine print, okay? Don't get duped by fake discounts. Happy shopping, everyone! May your wallets be full and your bags even fuller. And don't forget to bargain!
normalised: Remember to compare prices and read the fine print, okay? Don't get duped by fake discounts. Happy shopping, everyone! May your wallets be full and your bags even fuller. And don't forget to bargain!
